dcterms:creator: Roman Klinger
Orph√©e de Clercq
Saif M. Mohammad
Alexandra Balahur
dcterms:description: A dataset containing tweets with implicit emotions, where emotion keywords have been removed. The dataset is divided into training, validation, and test sets with a balanced distribution of six emotion labels: anger, fear, disgust, joy, sad, and surprise.
dcterms:title: WASSA 2018 Corpus

dcterms:creator: Cristian Danescu-Niculescu-Mizil
Lillian Lee
dcterms:description: A corpus of movie dialogues annotated with emotions, including fear, surprise, anger, disgust, joy, sad, and neutral. The dataset is used to evaluate the generalization of emotion prediction models.
dcterms:title: Cornell Movie Corpus

dcterms:creator: Sheng-Yeh Chen
Chao-Chun Hsu
Chuan-Chun Kuo
Ting-Hao Huang
Lun-Wei Ku
dcterms:description: An emotion corpus based on conversations from the TV show 'Friends', annotated with emotion labels. The dataset is used for emotion classification tasks.
dcterms:title: Friends Corpus

dcterms:creator: Saif M. Mohammad
dcterms:description: A lexicon providing valence, arousal, and dominance (VAD) scores for words. The dataset is used to guide emotion prediction models by incorporating affective features.
dcterms:title: VAD Lexicon
